page.title: 07SCHOOL LOG BOOK CONTINUED..
page.content: On December 20th 1942 it was so dark no written work could be done.On January 14th 1943 the eleven plus part 1 took place.On 25th February part 2 of the eleven plus took place.On December 16th part 1 of the eleven plus took place.Part 2 took place on the 16th of Febuary 1944.Extract from H.M.I.report 1936.This school became a junior department in 1934.Congestion in the main room was relieved and more effective training became possible.The discipline is now good.The children are on friendly terms with their teachers who have done much to make the classrooms attractive.On the whole the school is in a promising condition in spite of broken attendance due to epidemic sickness and to unusually large numbers of admissions and withdrawls.
